description: Monitor executed commands and arguments that may use brute force techniques to gain access to accounts when passwords are unknown or when password hashes are obtained. Analytic 1 - Command-line tools used for brute force attacks. (index=security sourcetype="Powershell" EventCode=4104) OR (index=os sourcetype="linux_secure" (cmdline IN ("*hydra*", "*medusa*", "*ncrack*", "*patator*", "*john*", "*hashcat*", "*rcrack*", "*w3af*", "*aircrack-ng*"))) OR (index=os sourcetype="macos_secure" (cmdline IN ("*hydra*", "*medusa*", "*ncrack*", "*patator*", "*john*", "*hashcat*", "*rcrack*", "*w3af*", "*aircrack-ng*"))) | where match(CommandLine, "(?i)(hydra|medusa|ncrack|patator|john|hashcat|rcrack|w3af|aircrack-ng)")
